snippet.title: Builderment Trailer
snippet.description:
Builderment is a factory building game at heart. It’s all about crafting and automation.

Increasingly complex recipes will create logistical challenges for you to overcome while growing your factory.

Earth has run out of resources... You have been sent to a distant planet to extract resources, build a base, and teleport items home. However, teleporting items across the galaxy will not be easy. Start automating the assembly of simple items such as Iron Gears and Wood Frames from resources nearby. Research technology to advance your production capabilities. Expand your base with Workshops, Furnaces, Manufacturers, and lots and lots of Belts. Oh and don't forget to save Earth!
